page.title: 08HENSBY COMPOSTS
page.content: Hensby Composts was founded in 1964.It sells two different types of compost.One is phase 1 compost,which is tested for quality then sold to customers,and the other is phase 2 compost which contains mushroom spawn. To make compost horse manure, chicken manure and straw are mixed together.The compost is left in long rows and is regularly turned to encourage fermentation.Once the process is complete the compost is formed into blocks and mushroom spawns are added.The machine wraps polythene around each block and it is stored until delivery to customers.
